Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You are faster and more courageous than
any I have witnessed. <sp:5:0:0>Take this in honor
of your incredible record.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>That is an extremely
impressive time.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>You are faster and more courageous than
any I have witnessed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>This is proof of your maturity. <sp:5:0:0>You have
absolutely earned it.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Link. I hope today has been a pleasant
one so far.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>Another new record.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Just how far can you push your skills?<sp:5:0:0>
I am eager to find out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>This is proof that you have surpassed your
previous limits. <sp:5:0:0>You have earned it.
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Link. I hope that today was a pleasant one
for you.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I must register you as the record holder.<sp:5:0:0>
Please state your name.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This is to commemorate your incredible
time. <sp:5:0:0>You have earned it.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>I have registered Link as the
current record holder.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You have been disqualified for leaving the
bounds of the course.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Your inventory is full. <sp:5:0:0>I cannot stuff this
into an already-packed pouch.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please dispose of any nonessentials you
are clinging to. <sp:5:0:0>There is a<clr:0000> large Zonai
charge <clr:ffff>I want to bestow.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I will show you the way. Register yourself
at the terminal first. Then we can begin.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you want to make another attempt?
The fee is still <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The time is now for you to show your
courage. <sp:5:1:0>Come test your mettle in the
dive ceremony!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Could it be? <sp:5:0:0>Do you not know the glory
of the dive ceremony?<sp:0:4:0>How sad for you. <sp:5:1:0>I will offer
enlightenment.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The dive ceremony is a trial for Zonai
youths to show their courage and enter
into adulthood.<sp:0:4:0>Challengers must dive from a sky island
high above. The goal is to <clr:0000>pass through
all the rings<clr:ffff> in a <clr:0000>set amount of time<clr:ffff>.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>First things first. We should perform a trial
run of the course.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Your goal is to <clr:0000>go through all of the rings<clr:ffff>.
Do not worry about a time limit yet.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The current record holder for fastest time
is you. That is not to say the record
is unbreakable.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Challenge the dive ceremony again so
that we can find out.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You did not succeed in going through all
of the rings. <sp:5:1:0>You will have to try again.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I have a <clr:0000>highly desirable outfit<clr:ffff> for those
who can overcome the trial.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Does that not sound enticing? Then prove
to me your courage.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your attempt was disqualified. You seem
to have neglected to go through each and
every ring.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That is truly a shame. <sp:5:0:0>I hope you will not
let this be your final attempt.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Very good. <sp:5:0:0>I will show you to the start
position. <sp:5:0:0>Get through all of the rings
<clr:0000>within <sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_41: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You may try again as often as you want.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You have already overcome the trial. But
real training never ends.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Show the best your courage will allow.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Your superb technique suggests that you
have done this before. <sp:5:0:0>I expect greatness
from you in the real ceremony.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please dispose of any nonessentials you
are clinging to. <sp:5:0:0>There is a<clr:0000> very special
outfit<clr:ffff> I want to bestow.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I am dismayed that you were unable to go
through all of the rings. <sp:5:0:0>That does count
as a failure. <sp:5:0:0>I hope you will try again.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is true that you have performed well
enough to earn your prize. But is this
the limit of your ambition?<sp:0:4:0>Strive for improvement and aim for a
higher record than <clr:0000><sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for jettisoning the detritus of
your pouch. <sp:5:0:0>I am pleased to award you
your prize.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I saw you attempt to dive before the
ceremony had commenced. <sp:5:1:0>I applaud
your enthusiasm.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Be sure that you have determined the
position of each ring before diving.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That is all I have to say before returning
you to the start. I hope to see you <clr:0000>pass
through all of the rings <clr:ffff>next time.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That outfit is proof of your maturity.<sp:5:0:0>
You have earned it.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then the time has come for the dive
ceremony. <sp:5:0:0>Assuming you are ready.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>A pleasant awakening ensures a fulfilling
day. <sp:5:1:0>Welcome to the dive ceremony.
Are you ready to begin?
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please dispose of any nonessentials you
are clinging to. <sp:5:0:0>There are <clr:0000>five rocket
capsules <clr:ffff>I want to bestow.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>The radiant light of the sun warms both
body and spirit. <sp:5:1:0>Welcome to the dive
ceremony. Are you ready to begin?
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please dispose of any nonessentials you
are clinging to. <sp:5:0:0>There are <clr:0000>five spring
capsules <clr:ffff>I want to bestow.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>It is diverting to pass the time by admiring
the twinkling stars. <sp:5:1:0>Welcome to the dive
ceremony. Are you ready to begin?
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please dispose of any nonessentials you
are clinging to. <sp:5:0:0>There are <clr:0000>five portable pot
capsules <clr:ffff>I want to bestow.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I must request an offering of <clr:0000>one
Zonai charge<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>It is necessary.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is an ancient tradition for ceremony
participants to offer a Zonai charge.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>To undergo it without a Zonai charge is
highly frowned upon. I must ask for your
understanding in these circumstances.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That is a bitter disappointment. <sp:5:1:0>Perhaps
another time.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hmm? <sp:5:1:0>This will not do. <sp:5:0:0>You do not have
a single <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff> to your name.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>You seem eager to perform the ceremony.
But you have no <clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I see no other way. I will allow the
ceremony go to forward without
an offering.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Understand that I am making a special
exception. <sp:5:0:0>This magnanimous gesture will
not be repeated.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This is not enough. <sp:5:0:0>I asked for only one
Zonai charge. Apparently that was
too much.<sp:0:4:0>The ceremony cannot go forward. Bring
a Zonai charge next time.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>You have wandered outside the bounds
of the course.<sp:0:4:0>Please wait. I will come collect you.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good. There is an initial requirement of
<clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Link. I hope today is a pleasant one
for you.
